/** @format */ import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { Grid, Card, CardContent, Typography, Table, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, TableBody, } from "@mui/material"; import NumberFormat from "react-number-format"; const LedgerCards = () => { return ( Time Entries Soft Cost Hard Cost Total Const Trust Total Due User Hours Total Jhon Johnson Mark MacCalloff Cindy Madenuff
); }; export default LedgerCards;
